Performance:
May 1976: The White Fox of Shinoda

Production: May 1976

Play: The White Fox of Shinoda (芦屋道満大内鑑)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

Kuzunoha's Parting with Her Son (葛の葉子別れ / Kuzunoha kowakare)

The Two Look-Alike Servants (信田森二人奴 / Shinoda no mori ninin yakko)

Characters:

Crown Prince Sakuragi (Sakuragi Shinnō / 桜木親王)

Motokata (Sadaishō Motokata / 左大将元方)

Yoshifuru (Ono Yoshifuru / 小野好古)

Sakaki (Sakakino mae / 榊の前)

Jibu (Iwakura Jibudayū / 岩倉治部大輔)

Taro (Sakon Tarō / 左近太郎)

Yasunori Kamo's widow (Kamono kōshitsu / 加茂の後室)

Heima (Inui Heima / 乾平馬)

Yasuna (Abeno Yasuna / 安倍保名)

Yokambei (Yakko Yokanbei / 奴与勘平)

Kuzunoha (Kuzunoha Hime / 葛の葉姫)

Akuemon (Ishikawa Akuemon / 石川悪右衛門)

Fox-Kuzunoha (Nyōbō Kuzunoha / 女房葛の葉)

Yasuna's son (Abeno Dōji / 安倍童子)

Dampachi (Momengai jitsuwa Egara Danpachi / 木綿買実は荏柄段八)

Shoji (Shinodano Shōji / 信田庄司)

Shoji's wife (Shōji no tsuma / 庄司の妻)

Unzo (Shigaraki Unzō / 信楽雲蔵)

Toji (Ochiai Tōji / 落合藤治)

Yakambei (Yakko Yakanbei / 奴野干平)

Saeda (Koshimoto Saeda / 腰元小枝)

Akuemon's followers (Kumiko / 組子)

Ladies-in-waiting (Koshimoto / 腰元)
